Originally from [Jesolo](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jesolo), I obtained my PhD in Economics at the University of Copenhagen, and have worked both in academia at [Lund University](https://www.lusem.lu.se/) and in policy at the [Danish Central Bank](https://www.lusem.lu.se/).

I am now Head of Data and Analytics at [Realkredit Danmark](https://www.rd.dk/), part of [Danske Bank](https://www.danskebank.com/) group.

Here you can find both my (very infrequenctly updated) [blog](tidbits.qmd) and my old [research](research.qmd) projects.
